description:
The code-name of this app, Stoorworm, comes from a powerful Celtic mythological water creature. While this app isn't as powerful as the beast itself, it's powerful enough to be a strong helper to you. 

Artists maybe searching for this kind of app a long time. Now it's here!

This app will deliver rhyming words blazingly fast.

For instance, if you are searching rhymes for the word 'rain', the app will show you words like 'brain, gain' and so on...

This app is equally useful for budding as well as seasoned poets and lyricists, helping them to weave beautiful poems and songs by providing them with beautiful rhyming words.

Try it today! 

[Internet connection required. Compatible with Pre, Pre 2, Pre 3, Pixi and Veer]
copyright: App is Copyright by Simon Pfundstein, 2011
